thread.title: BRIEF-Boeing Introduces New Mobile Version Of JDM Flight Data Update Technology Through Unit, New Alliance With Bad Elf​

title: BRIEF-Boeing Introduces New Mobile Version Of JDM Flight Data Update Technology Through Unit, New Alliance With Bad Elf​

organizations.name: new alliance with bad elf​ reuters

text:
Market News April 2, 2018 / 11:49 AM / Updated 7 minutes ago BRIEF-Boeing Introduces New Mobile Version Of JDM Flight Data Update Technology Through Unit, New Alliance With Bad Elf​ Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 2 (Reuters) - Boeing Co: 
* ‍THROUGH UNIT INTRODUCED NEW MOBILE VERSION OF ITS JDM FLIGHT DATA UPDATE TECHNOLOGY, AND A NEW ALLIANCE WITH BAD ELF​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
